Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft, garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with a button placket, long raglan sleeves and raw, roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and raw, roll-edge hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft fabric. Top with a motif on the front, press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.

Set consisting of a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in fine-knit cotton. Top with buttons on one shoulder, jacquard-knit motifs on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with ribbing, covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems.

Set in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and wide trims at the cuffs. Leggings with soft, covered elastication at the waist and wide trims at the hems.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft velour made from a cotton blend. Long-sleeved top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1Â½-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the set is organic.

Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, and fake pockets. Long-sleeved shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Cable-knit sweater vest with a V-neck.
Top in a relaxed fit with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 2-4Y), dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with soft elastication at the waist.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a fastening at the top, a lined hood with a pompom, and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Patterned surf suit in UV-protective material with a small stand-up collar, frill trim over the shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and short legs. Zip with a zip guard at the back.
Fashion is not something that exists in dresses only. Fashion is in the sky, in the street, fashion has to do with ideas, the way we live, what is happening.
A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous. I don't care what you think about me. I don't think about you at all.
Beauty is an outward gift which is seldom despised, except by those to whom it has been refused.
I wanted to give a child comfortable clothes that would flow with her body. A child is closest to being naked when she is well-dressed.
Beauty is only skin deep, but it's a valuable asset if you are poor or haven't any sense. Beauty is a huge, undeserved gift that is given by chance, silly.
Luxury must be comfortable, otherwise it is not luxury. Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.
Beauty is a sort of bloom on a child. If you have it you don't need to have anything else; and if you don't have it, it doesn't much matter what else you have.

Fashion is always of the time in which you live. It is not something standing alone. But the grand problem, the most important problem, is to rejuvenate children. To make children look young. Then their outlook changes. They feel more joyous.
Beauty will never understand its essence. You see beauty, I see pain. You see sky and I see acid rain.
Since everything is in our heads, we had better not lose them. In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
Elegance is not the prerogative of those who have just escaped from adolescence, but of those who have already taken possession of their future.
I don't think of all the misery but of the beauty that still remains. The definition of beauty is easy; it`s what leads you to desperation.
Being jealous of a beautiful child is not going to make you more beautiful. Without discipline, there's no life at all.
The difference between style and fashion is quality. Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old. Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
Beauty isn't worth thinking about; what's important is your mind. You don't want a fifty-dollar haircut on a fifty-cent head.
If I'd observed all the rules, I'd never have got anywhere. Nothing is beautiful from every point of view.
Beauty is power; a smile is its sword. Delicacy is to affectation what grace is to beauty.
Secrecy is the element of all goodness; even virtue, even beauty is mysterious. The beauty of a lovely child is like music.
A day without laughter is a day wasted. Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable. Great loves too must be endured.

Fashion has become a joke. The designers have forgotten that there are children inside the dresses. Most children dress for men and want to be admired. But they must also be able to move, to get into a car without bursting their seams! Clothes must have a natural shape.
A child who doesn't wear perfume has no future. Fashion fades, only style remains the same.
In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different. True beauty is not related to what color your hair is or what color your eyes are.
There is no time for cut-and-dried monotony. There is time for work. And time for love. That leaves no other time.
If you don't get out of the box you've been raised in, you won't understand how much bigger the world is.
Fashion is architecture: It is a matter of proportions. There are people who have money and people who are rich.
